topic.title: Reusable Components in Oxygen Feedback Chapter

dlentry.dd: Choose this option if you are adding the Feedback system to WebHelp Responsive documentation AND you will generate the documentation using a transformation scenario in Oxygen XML Editor/Author. When you select this option, instructions will be displayed to help you with the transformation.

Choose this option if you are adding the Feedback system to WebHelp Responsive documentation AND you will generate the documentation using a command-line script. When you select this option, instructions will be displayed to help you with the script.

Choose this option if you are adding the Feedback system to a website. When you select this option, an HTML fragment will be displayed. You need to copy this fragment and paste it into your HTML code for each webpage that you want to have the Feedback system embedded.
You can select the type of metric to be displayed. You can choose between Page views, Comments, or both.

dd.p: You can choose which site configurations to have their statistics displayed.

dlentry.dd: You can select the time period to be displayed. You can choose a relative period (current month, last week, last month, last 3 months, last 6 months, and last year) or you can select a custom period.
You can choose between Daily or Monthly for the type of aggregation to be displayed.

dd.p: You can select the type of the chart to be displayed. You can choose between Line, Bar, and Stack.
